mapper.update: update order_pay_return set return_amount = #{return_amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, return_employee_code = #{return_employee_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, return_employee_name = #{return_employee_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, return_create_date = #{return_create_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, order_pay_return_type = #{order_pay_return_type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_pay_return_source = #{order_pay_return_source,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay_return_remark = #{pay_return_remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where order_pay_return_id = #{order_pay_return_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select order_pay_return_id, return_amount, return_employee_code, return_employee_name, return_create_date, order_pay_return_type, order_pay_return_source, pay_return_remark from order_pay_return where order_pay_return_id = #{order_pay_return_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
